title: Replace OnPaintSurface at runtime
body:
hi

we  use SkiaSharp in Blazor WASM . 
Is it possible to replace or make partial  change in this method at runtime ?

thank you

comments.author: SalimiHabib
comments.body:
there is an answer in stack overflow
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7299097/dynamically-replace-the-contents-of-a-c-sharp-method
